00037 #include "egs_polygon_shape.h"
00038 #include "egs_polygon.h"
00039 #include "egs_input.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"
00041 #include "egs_math.h"

00043 EGS_TriangleShape::EGS_TriangleShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points,
00044         const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f) {
00045     xo = points[0]; yo = points[1];
00046     ax = points[2] - xo; ay = points[3] - yo;
00047     bx = points[4] - xo; by = points[5] - yo;
00048     A = 0.5*fabs(ax*by-ay*bx);
00049 }
00050 
00051 EGS_TriangleShape::EGS_TriangleShape(const EGS_Float *points,
00052         const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f) {
00053     xo = points[0]; yo = points[1];
00054     ax = points[2] - xo; ay = points[3] - yo;
00055     bx = points[4] - xo; by = points[5] - yo;
00056     A = 0.5*fabs(ax*by-ay*bx);
00057 }
00058 
00059 EGS_PolygonShape::EGS_PolygonShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points,
00060     const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f) {
00061     int np = points.size(); n = np/2;
00062     EGS_Float auxx = points[np-2] - points[0];
00063     EGS_Float auxy = points[np-1] - points[1];
00064     EGS_Float *xc, *yc;
00065     if( auxx*auxx + auxy*auxy > 1e-8 ) n++;
00066     xc = new EGS_Float [n]; yc = new EGS_Float [n];
00067     vector<EGS_2DVector> p1;
00068     for(int j=0; j<np/2; j++) {
00069         xc[j] = points[2*j]; yc[j] = points[2*j+1];
00070         p1.push_back(EGS_2DVector(xc[j],yc[j]));
00071     }
00072     if( n > np/2 ) {
00073         xc[n-1] = points[0]; yc[n-1] = points[1];
00074         p1.push_back(EGS_2DVector(xc[n-1],yc[n-1]));
00075     }
00076     EGS_2DPolygon pol(p1);
00077     int ntr = 0; triangle = new EGS_TriangleShape* [n-3]; np = n;
00078     EGS_Float p_tmp[6];
00079     while ( np > 3 ) {
00080         for(int i=0; i<np-2; i++) {
00081             EGS_2DVector aux(0.5*(xc[i+2]+xc[i]),0.5*(yc[i+2]+yc[i]));
00082             if( pol.isInside(aux) ) {
00083                 bool is_ok = true; vector<EGS_2DVector> p2;
00084                 for(int k=0; k<3; k++) {
00085                     p_tmp[2*k] = xc[i+k]; p_tmp[2*k+1] = yc[i+k];
00086                     p2.push_back(EGS_2DVector(xc[i+k],yc[i+k]));
00087                 }
00088                 EGS_2DPolygon tri(p2);
00089                 for(int j=0; j<np-1; j++) {
00090                     if( j < i || j > i+2 ) {
00091                         EGS_2DVector tmp(xc[j],yc[j]);
00092                         if( tri.isInside(tmp) ) { is_ok = false; break; }
00093                     }
00094                 }
00095                 if( is_ok ) {
00096                     EGS_TriangleShape *t = new EGS_TriangleShape(p_tmp);
00097                     triangle[ntr++] = t;
00098                     for(int j=i+1; j<np-1; j++) {
00099                         xc[j] = xc[j+1]; yc[j] = yc[j+1];
00100                     }
00101                 }
00102                 np--;
00103             }
00104         }
00105     }
00106     for(int k=0; k<3; k++) { p_tmp[2*k] = xc[k]; p_tmp[2*k+1] = yc[k]; }
00107     triangle[ntr++] = new EGS_TriangleShape(p_tmp);
00108     A = 0;
00109     for(int i=0; i<ntr; i++) { yc[i] = triangle[i]->area(); A += yc[i]; }
00110     table = new EGS_AliasTable(ntr,xc,yc,0);
00111     delete [] xc; delete [] yc;
00112 }

00114 extern "C" {
00115 
00116 EGS_POLYGON_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape* createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00117         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00118     if( !input ) {
00119         egsWarning("createShape(polygon): null input?\n"); return 0;
00120     }
00121     vector<EGS_Float> points;
00122     int err = input->getInput("points",points);
00123     if( err ) {
00124         egsWarning("createShape(polygon): no 'points' input\n"); return 0;
00125     }
00126     int np = points.size();
00127     if( (np%2) != 0 ) {
00128         egsWarning("createShape(polygon): you must input an even number of"
00129              " floating numbers\n"); return 0;
00130     }
00131     if( np < 6 ) {
00132         egsWarning("createShape(polygon): you must input at least 3 2D points"
00133              " to form a polygon\n");
00134         return 0;
00135     }
00136     EGS_BaseShape *shape;
00137     if( np == 6 ) shape = new EGS_TriangleShape(points,"",f);
00138     else shape = new EGS_PolygonShape(points,"",f);
00139     shape->setName(input); shape->setTransformation(input);
00140     return shape;
00141 }
